line.comment: * We never sign a truce if we are at total war or unbreakable alliance.
* Cannot sign a truce with a coalition enemy.

line.text: ' has signed a truce with the '

line.comment: * Retreat from the sectors of our new "friend".
* If the AI conquers a player sector, it always asked for truce, even if there are other ongoing claims.

sval.val: has signed a truce with the
We never sign a truce if we are at total war or unbreakable alliance.
Cannot sign a truce with a coalition enemy.
Retreat from the sectors of our new "friend".
If the AI conquers a player sector, it always asked for truce, even if there are other ongoing claims.
